results.name: Triangle read by rows where T(m,n)=2*m*n + m + n - 9.
comment: First column: A016777, second column: A016885, third column: A016993, fourth column: A017209. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 20 2012
mathematica: t[n_,k_]:=2 n*k + n + k - 9; Table[t[n, k], {n, 15}, {k, n}]//Flatten (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 20 2012 *)
program: (MAGMA) [2*n*k + n + k - 9: k in [1..n], n in [1..11]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 20 2012
